attributes.action: for a veterans register for better care.
attributes.additional_details:
an on line e petition to get the government to set up a veterans register so veterans and their families  can be traced after service to find out how  many are homeless how many are in prison how many are unemployed how many are suffering due to military service, how many have gone through marriage breakups due to the stress and how many have taken their lives.
other countries have a veteran register,its time we did too. the sacrifices that veterans and families have made deserve to be looked after and helped after service,starting now its time for the government to put this register  in place then the government as a better picture of what as been done.
